inclusion.criterion: A diagnosis of sickle cell disease (HbSS, HbSC, HbS- β+ or 0) confirmed by hemoglobin electrophoresis
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Suspicion of Pulmonary Hypertension by echocardiography within the last 6 months (RVSP > 40mmHg or a TRV > 3.0 m/sec)
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Clinically significant laboratory abnormalities, including, but not limited to: Positive Hepatitis B surface antigen or Hepatitis C antibody, Positive HIV test, Serum alanine aminotransferase (ALT) greater than or equal to 2.0 x ULN
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has hypertension and hyperlipidemia but no acute intracranial findings on CT angiogram.
